job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes core software engineering activities focused on the lifecycle of a software product.

job_tasks.phrase: Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
job_tasks.justification: These are activities related to the exploration and development of software features, fitting within traditional software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
job_tasks.justification: This focuses on building and verifying software components and ensuring their quality through standard testing methodologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding business needs and translating them into technical requirements via user stories and acceptance tests, aligning with business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
job_tasks.justification: Refers to development practices that ensure code quality and team collaboration on code, which are part of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes adherence to software engineering best practices for building robust and high-quality solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions collaboration with another role.
Paired programming is a collaborative coding practice.

soft_skills.phrase: Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
soft_skills.justification: Directly describes communication and fostering a collaborative environment.

soft_skills.phrase: Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.
soft_skills.justification: Mentions leveraging expertise and sharing knowledge, which are collaborative activities.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses exclusively on traditional software engineering tasks such as designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software components using C++. There are no tasks related to AI model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, RAG, or AI-specific data engineering. The mention of 'AI' in the title does not translate into specific AI/ML development responsibilities within the detailed job description.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the core responsibilities and technologies. While the title mentions 'AI', the detailed bullet points are unequivocally focused on traditional software engineering practices. There's no ambiguity in the described tasks.
